sentence.Network_en: The earthquake made the roadbed cave in.
He flopped to the sandy roadbed and twisted like an injured snake.
sentence.Network_cn: 他扑倒在沙土路上像一条受了伤的蛇一般蜷缩成一团.

sentence.Network_en: Put up your hands to build a home of the roadbed.
sentence.Network_cn: 搭起双手筑成你回家的路基.
